verse.name: c1
verse.lines: We be soldiers three, Pardonnez-moi je vous en prie, Lately come forth of the low country, With never a penny of money.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Here, good fellow, I drink to thee, Pardonnez-moi je vous en prie To all good fellows wherever they be, With never a penny of money.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And he that will not pledge me this, Pardonnez-moi je vous en prie, Pays for the shot, whatever it is, With never a penny of money.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Charge it again, boys, charge it again, Pardonnez-moi je vous en prie, As long as you have any ink in your pen, With never a penny of money.
